mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into logs (url, `method`, ip, class_method, args, response, reqtime, timecost) values (#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{args,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{response,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reqtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{timecost,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update logs set url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `method` = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, class_method = #{classMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, args = #{args,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, response = #{response,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reqtime = #{reqtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, timecost = #{timecost,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, url, `method`, ip, class_method, args, response, reqtime, timecost from logs
